contentList.content: Add a bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> by 2, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> by 4, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> by 6, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> by 8, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> by 10, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> by 12, to a maximum of 30.
Add a bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> by 2, to a maximum of 30.

Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> by 4, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> by 6, to a maximum of 30.

Add a bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag>.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> by 2, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> by 4, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> by 6, to a maximum of 30.

Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> by 10, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> by 12, to a maximum of 30.
Add a bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag>.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 2, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 4, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 6, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 8, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 10, to a maximum of 30.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> by 12, to a maximum of 30.
Add a bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability</LSTag> checks.
No bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability</LSTag> checks.
Add 4 to your <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability</LSTag> checks.
Add 8 to your <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability</LSTag> checks.
Add 12 to your <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability</LSTag> checks.
Add 16 to your <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability</LSTag> checks.
Add 20 to your <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability</LSTag> checks.

On selecting this feature, you receive <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="TavernBrawler">Tavern Brawler</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="FastHands">Fast Hands</LSTag>. At level 5, you receive <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">Extra Attack</LSTag>. Finally, at level 11, you receive <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack_2">Improved Extra Attack</LSTag>.

On selecting this feature, you receive <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="FightingStyle_GreatWeaponFighting">Great Weapon Fighting</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Serenade_ProdigyGreatWeaponMaster">Great Weapon Master</LSTag>. At level 5, you receive <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">Extra Attack</LSTag>. At level 9, you receive <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Whirlwind">Whirlwind</LSTag>. Finally, at level 11, you receive <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack_2">Improved Extra Attack</LSTag>.

On selecting this feature, you receive <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="FightingStyle_TwoWeaponFighting">Two-Weapon Fighting</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Serenade_ProdigyDualWielder">Dual Wielder</LSTag>. At level 5, you receive <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">Extra Attack</LSTag>. At level 9, you receive <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Whirlwind">Whirlwind</LSTag>. Finally, at level 11, you receive <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack_2">Improved Extra Attack</LSTag>.

On selecting this feature, you receive <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="FightingStyle_Archery">Archery</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Serenade_ProdigySharpshooter">Sharpshooter</LSTag>. At level 5, you receive <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">Extra Attack</LSTag>. At level 9, you receive <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Volley">Volley</LSTag>. Finally, at level 11, you receive <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack_2">Improved Extra Attack</LSTag>.
